name: "Humanity's Name" Unfettered
title: Mavuika: "Humanity's Name" Unfettered
in_play_description: After you play a Technique card: If possible, Mavuika recovers 1 Nightsoul point. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Mavuika to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Select 1 card from 3 Flamestrider cards to add to your Hand.
After you play a Technique card: If possible, Mavuika recovers 1 Nightsoul point. (Once per Round)
(You must have Mavuika in your deck to add this card to your deck)
